form.name: Experiment Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Short summary of the experimentâ€™s purpose. To add instructions, use the Instruction Node in the flow section

protocols.noProtocolsLinked: No protocols linked to this experiment
protocols.noFlowYet: This experiment has no flow yet

flow.title: Measurement Flow
flow.description: Design and visualize your measurement workflow by connecting different steps and operations.
flow.editDescription: Design and visualize your measurement workflow by connecting different steps and operations. Please make sure every block has a uniquely named 'label' and the flow has 1 Measurement block and 1 Analysis block.
flow.staticDescription: Visual overview of the measurement workflow

questionTooltip.title: Data Column Name
questionTooltip.description: This label will become a column in your data analysis:

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.description: Analyze your experiment data with visualizations and notebooks

experimentData.title: Experiment Data
experimentData.description: View, download and manage data associated with this experiment. New data is processed every 15 minutes. Timestamps are in UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)

provisioning.title: Experiment is Being Prepared
provisioning.description: The experiment infrastructure is currently being set up. Data access will be available once provisioning is complete.
provisioning.tooltip: During provisioning, the system is creating database schemas, setting up data pipelines, and configuring access permissions. This process usually takes a few minutes.

provisioningFailed.title: Experiment Setup Failed
provisioningFailed.description: There was an issue setting up the experiment infrastructure. Please contact support or try recreating the experiment.

location.noLocationsDescription: This experiment doesn't have any locations configured.

locations.noLocationsDescription: This experiment doesn't have any locations configured.

locations.title: Location Management
locations.noLocationsDescription: Add locations to specify where this experiment takes place
locations.editModeDescription: Click on the map to add locations, click existing markers to edit or remove them

manageExperimentDescription: View and manage experiment details, data, flow, and settings.
noPermissionToAccess: You do not have permission to access this experiment
errorLoadingExperiment: An error occurred while loading the experiment
experimentNotFound: The experiment you're looking for could not be found
needMemberAccess: You need member access to perform this action
needAdminAccess: You need admin access to perform this action

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date

questionCard.placeholder: What would you like to ask?
questionCard.requiredDescription: Participants must answer this question to continue
questionCard.textResponseDescription: Participants can write their own answer
questionCard.numberResponseDescription: Participants will enter a numeric value
questionCard.booleanResponseDescription: Participants will choose Yes or No

bulkAdd.title: Bulk Add Answer Options
bulkAdd.description: Paste a list of options below. Each option should be on a new line. Great for copying from Excel or CSV files!
bulkAdd.hint: Tip: Copy the column from your Excel/CSV file and paste it here

deleteAll.title: Delete All Options?
deleteAll.description: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} options? This action cannot be undone.

uploadModal.title: Upload Sensor Data
uploadModal.description: Upload sensor data to your experiment for analysis

sensorFamily.label: Select Sensor Family
sensorFamily.description: Choose the type of sensor data you want to upload

ambyte.label: Ambyte (Coming soon)
ambyte.description: Upload Ambyte sensor folders containing measurement data

fileUpload.title: Upload Ambyte Data
fileUpload.description: Select an Ambyte folder (e.g., "Ambyte_10") or individual ambit subfolders (e.g., "1", "2", "3", "4"). The folder should contain .txt measurement files.
fileUpload.browseInstruction: Click to browse for an Ambyte data folder
fileUpload.uploadingDescription: Please wait while your files are being processed

uploading.title: Uploading Data
uploading.description: Please wait while we process your sensor data...

success.title: Upload Successful
success.description: Your sensor data has been successfully uploaded to the experiment. It has been queued for processing and will appear in the experiment data overview in a few minutes.

validation.title: You have the following problems with the selected files:
validation.selectFolder: Please select a folder containing Ambyte data, not individual files
validation.invalidStructure: Invalid Ambyte folder structure. Expected folders either named like 'Ambyte_10' or folder containing sub-folders named like 'Ambyte_10'.
validation.fileSizeExceeded: {{count}} file(s) exceed the maximum size limit of 10MB

excludedFiles.warningMessage: The following file(s) will be automatically excluded from the upload:
